title: Your TikTok video uploads can now be up to 10 minutes long
content:
TikTok started as platform to share bite-sized video footages for informative, comic, and entertainment purposes. The service slowly started growing to become one of the favorite apps amongst teenagers and young adults. Less than a year ago, the company increased the maximum length limit of a video to 3 minutes. This has enabled users to

The post Your TikTok video uploads can now be up to 10 minutes long appeared first on xda-developers.
description: TikTok is rolling out the ability to upload videos that are up to 10 minutes long. Previously, users were limited to a maximum of 3 minutes.
